October shows - unplugged.

Hello.

I’m playing some shows this October, all of which will be fully unplugged and in venues of 50 capacity or under.

Support comes from Warren Mallia, songwriter of Grand-Pop (Specialist Subject Records) and The Attika State (Alcopop Records) on all dates apart from Bristol.

Dates, ticket details, and Facebook events for RSVP/sharing are below:

Tuesday 17th October - Gullivers, Manchester. Tickets / Facebook event

Wednesday 18th October - Singleshot, Leeds. Tickets / Facebook event

Thursday 19th October - Aces & Eights, London. *SOLD OUT*

Friday 20th October - Cafe Kino, Bristol. Tickets / Facebook event
